name: Amazing Soccer 2013
description:
The Ultimate Soccer Experience
Play Amazing Soccer 2013, the most immersive and dynamic soccer game on the App store. The time of Amazing Soccer 2013 has come. Play HARD or don't play at all
PURE PASSION. TRUE INTENSITY.

FEATURES: 
- Easy to play
 - Amazing 3D visuals and immersive sound 
- Full control of your players: shooting, passing and tackling in an easy manner.
- Amazing Soccer 2013 has been developed with the Most optimized game engines for mobile device. 
- Soccer simulator in full 3D environment. 

Amazing Soccer 2013 brings soccer game play to your device for endless hours of soccer fun.

SOCIAL: https://www.facebook.com/AmazingSoccer2013
